## ğŸŒ Contribute to a Greener Planet!
The **'Search on Web'** option, available exclusively at **[[bhuvaneshm.in/cosmotalker](https://bhuvaneshm.in/cosmotalker)](https://bhuvaneshm.in/cosmotalker)**, helps support global reforestation ğŸŒ±ğŸ’š. Powered by Ecosia, every search helps plant trees and contributes to a healthier environment ğŸŒ³. This feature is not available in the Python library module.



## ğŸ›  How to Use
```python
import cosmotalker

# Example usage
result = cosmotalker.get("earth")
print(result)
```
ğŸ“Œ Note: The get function requires a string input. If the name contains multiple words, use a hyphen (-) instead of spaces.âœ… Example: get("planet-x") instead of get("planet x").
